mods.abstract: Female child, all-wood doll, light brown mohair wig, sleeping eyes, open mouth with two upper teeth, fully spring-jointed(including ankles), white lace-trimmed blouse, skirt with suspender, bloomer, black flat sole leather shoes, Schoenhut family came from Germany to U.S. And started a toy factory in 1872. Went out of business in 1935. Stamped on back of body, 'SCHOENHUT DOLL, Pat. Jan. 17, 1911 U.S.A.' (Ref. 1) Shoes were replaced.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
